1240390.name: Them's Fightin' Herds - Shadow Palette Pack
1240390.description:
Take on the unsettling appearance of the mysterious specters who haunt the Salt Mines!

Details

This DLC includes:
  • Unlocked Shadow Palette for each character in the roster, current and future!

Alternative Unlock Condition

Shadow Palettes can also be obtained with an in-game unlock condition. Complete a Salt Mines run while earning the "Apex Predator" bonus to unlock the Shadow Palette for the character you played during the run. "Apex Predator" is awarded by becoming the boss bear and defeating all other players in the Final Showdown phase.

Notice: You must be playing on an Official (blue) or Partnered (green) Pixel Lobby server to unlock Shadow Palettes this way. Community-created (white) servers do not award special unlocks.
